GetTDewPointFromHumRatio#

otters.wrangle.psychrometrics.GetTDewPointFromHumRatio(TDryBulb: float, HumRatio: float, Pressure: float) → float[source]#

Return dew-point temperature given dry-bulb temperature, humidity ratio, and pressure.

Args:

TDryBulb : Dry-bulb temperature in °F [IP] or °C [SI] HumRatio : Humidity ratio in lb_H₂O lb_Air⁻¹ [IP] or kg_H₂O kg_Air⁻¹ [SI] Pressure : Atmospheric pressure in Psi [IP] or Pa [SI]

Returns:

Dew-point temperature in °F [IP] or °C [SI]

Reference:

ASHRAE Handbook - Fundamentals (2017) ch. 1

GetTCelsiusFromTKelvin
